desc: Handcrafted Equestrian Jewelry and Accessories with very fine detail in near 3D. Dimension and detail set us apart as wearable art in Equ...

layout.text: All the 'Online Store Collections' are listed at the top center of this page
Have Gift Certificate? Please email and I will help you with it, on "Contact Us " page.

My work conveys a new dimension in wearable art. As an emerging artist, I strive to capture the enchantment of my subject in an accurate but charming moment. Initially sculpted and carved in wax, my designs are cast by the Lost Wax Method on site.  My original creations captured horses, but then went on to add foxes, birds, nature, nautical, some dogs and cats. Please be patient while we bring this new site up to speed with all our designs. Have a question? We would love to hear from you!! EMAIL: TempiDesign@gmail.com
